Ricochet ist ein Multiplayer Shooter indem man statt mit Waffen, mit Discs (Frisbees) um sich wirft.

Auf den verschiedenen Maps kann man Power Ups, welche zufällig auf diesen spawnen aufheben z.B. Dreifachschuss um drei Discs gleichzeitig zu werfen, Schnellschuss um Discs schneller aubzufeuern oder auch Lähmschuss um getroffene Gegner zu verlangsamen.

Durch jeden direkten Treffer erhält man 1 Punkt durch indirekte Treffer oder Kopftreffer jeweils 3 Punkte.

Das Spielprinzip ist demnach sehr einfach man läuft einfach rum wirft mit Discs Gegner ab und sammelt Punkte, was in der Stunde die ich es bis jetzt gespielt habe ziemlich viel Spaß gemacht hat.

Schade finde ich nur das es im Spiel keine Musik gibt nur den Schusssound der Discs, den Todesschrei wenn man von der Map fällt und den Sound wenn man wieder spawnt.

Das Spiel ist im Download nur 6MB groß benötigt aber Half Life damit man es starten kann.
Very good and only for the very skilled.

На свете есть много игр от известных компаний, про которые мало кто вспоминает. В число этих игр попадает [i]Ricochet[/i]. Изначально это был очередной мод для [i]Half-Life[/i], который затем был выкуплен [i]Valve[/i] и выпущен в качестве отдельной игры. Игру немного обновляли, а затем просто забросили.

Геймплей очень прост: прыгаешь с платформы на платформу и кидаешь диск в противников, чтобы скинуть их с этих платформ (или чтобы отрубить их головы). Для дисков можно собирать пауэр-апы, которые из раза в раз появляются над пропастью. И всё.

А вы ждали чего-то большего?

[b]??/10[/b]
[i]Для тех, кто хочет сыграть во все игры от Valve (и для тех, кто хочет доказать, что эта игра не забыта).[/i]
和基友一起玩 是挺好玩的 可最大的缺点就是延迟了
best game 10/10

Ricochet would be Valve's most obscure game not called [url=http://store.steampowered.com/recommended/recommendgame/40]Deathmatch Classic[/url] if it didn't become a minor meme exactly for being Valve's most obscure game that isn't Deathmatch Classic. It's essentially a first person Tron mod for Half-Life where you run around platforms and throw discs at enemies to try and knock them off into the void.

I...guess the gameplay is okay for what it is? I wouldn't exactly know, because despite its meme status very few people actually play this game - and there are no bots. You can arrange pick-up games with a couple likeminded folks on the game's community forum, but that's it.

If you do own it, it's probably because you're a Valve nerd who bought the Complete Pack, a dyed-in-the-wool retro gamer who bought the Counter-Strike 1 Anthology which has this game for some reason, or a memelord. I don't know if it's even worth it for anybody else, unless you know other people who not only own but want to play it. This is yet another game that I'd like to give a "mixed" rating to, and there's even a mixed icon on the Steam store's search results to display a game with middling user reviews! Come on Valve, show some initiative again.

Interestingly, the "variety of futuristic battle arenas" touted on the store page boils down to 3 maps that look the same, although given the nature of gameplay they seem to be designed alright. Also, props to the death screams and total lack of music or ambient noise for making the game a little creepy when nobody else is playing.
Thank You, Valve.

Que es esta mierda. Valve, QUE ES ESTA MIERDA?! Esto me venia con el pack de valve, me pongo a jugar y es mierda. bien. Pero me hago una pregunta, por que tiene tan buenas reviews?! La gente cosidera ESTO bueno?!
Dejadme empezar.
Ricochet es un juego en el que vas de plataforma en plataforma disparando, tambien hay otras cosas que puedes utilizar en el escenario para matar a los enemigos, lo cual da a un gameplay mas innovador.
...Esto es la teoria. Es una buena idea, pero esta llevada a cabo de una forma pesima.
Las plataformas son enanas, haciendo que sea comun saltar a una plataforma y caerte sin darte cuenta.
Cada vez que mueres tienes que ver una escena donde se te ve cayendo. Y es muy molesta, debido a que mueres cada dos por tres.
Tambien pasa mucho que vas a otra plataforma pero te chocas en el medio del aire con otro jugador y los dos caeis al vacio.
No puedes disparar para arriba o para abajo, siempre disparas recto.
Solo hay tres mapas (Aunque a mi me parecen los mismos)
Y, debido a todo lo anterior, nadie juega. Si ves a alguien jugando es porque 1.Acaba de comprar el juego o 2. Lo tiene desde hace un tiempo pero no se acuerda de porque no lo jugo tanto, asi que lo juega durante 5 minutos, los suficientes como para recordar por que no lo juega.

Y tras todo lo que he dicho, sale gente a defender este juego.

Conclusion: Buena idea, pero llevada a cabo de una forma pesima.

Valve has made many popular FPS games over the years. Half-Life 1 & 2, Counter Strike, Left 4 Dead, DoD and TF2. But there is one game everyone seems to forget; Ricochet. Ricochet is by far my favorite of the lot. NO, IT'S MY FAVORITE GAME OF ALL TIME. Great graphics, great gameplay, great story, memorable characters, great character, anything a that makes a game good, THIS GAME HAS IT. But, I bet you're saying "But no game is perfect." AND THAT'S WHERE YOU'RE WRONG. THis game has literally nothing wrong with it. Repetitive gameplay? Nope. Badly designed and boring maps that are just a bunch of floating platforms with nothing interesting going on? NOPE. This game has literally nothing wrong with it, to the point where it ascends above being just a game, or even a work of art, for that matter. This game has ascended to a point where words cannot describe the quality of this game. And if you have the fucking audacity to disagree with me, then I hope that our god Gabe Newell will ruin your fucking life by VAC banning your steam account, reporting you to the police for Child Pornography that he placed onto your PC, and make sure that you die, a slow, terrible death in jail. While others may want a Half-Life 3, I want a Ricochet 2 & 3 to grace this planet, and revolutionize the entire planet. So, in conclusion, this game is the meaning of life itself, and proves that Gabe Newell can create the best things on the entire fucking planet, and that God is real. If you don't buy this game, than you will not go to heaven, and will live a sad, incomplete, and meaningless life.
Like

Ricochet is the best game ever developed! I'd pay a billion dollars just to play Ricochet for 5 minutes! If you do buy this game, be aware that the servers are always too full for you to join, so you may be sitting there for a couple hours (maybe even days) just to get into a game (an extravagant one mind you). I even have a Ricochet jump pad and light frisbee tattooed on my face! I sacrificed getting a job for my whole life just because I love this game! So please do the same and don't buy or ruin your face with some smut like any of the other games they've put out and/or published.................

Ricochet hat mein leben verändert. Seitdem ich es gespielt habe, kann ich 30 Meter weit springen, im Weltraum atmen und bin Weltmeister im Diskusswerfen. Bei der Story muss man aber konzentriert sein. Diese ist sehr kompliziert und hat sehr viele Plottwists. Also gut aufpassen!
Alles in allem: Klare Kaufempfehlung!
Game of the year. Game of all years.

Ricochet is one of those rare games that is a true masterpiece. Every aspect of the game, from the gameplay, to the animations, to the sound effects are of the highest quality. The gameplay is truly original and a real paradigm shifter. Ricochet's gameplay is cleverly described in the name; you throw out disks (like the kind you'd find in the hit movie Tron) and are able to "Ricochet" them off of your suroundings in order to fight your opponents. There are amazingly diverse and creative powerups in your arena that can augment your disks to give them a temporary new mechanic. While the game was likely meant to be played with multiple people, Ricochet has really become an experience that the developers could never have expected as a singleplayer masterpiece. The game is such a fluid and clean experience that draws you in and never lets you go, but at the same time giving you a better understanding of your own life in the world around you. This game supplies fullfilment in a way that no other game can give nor could be expected to give. There is only one question left unanswered by Ricochet. When are we going to be gifted with its sequel, Ricochet 2?

I decided to play this with my friends as a joke, when suddenly a random guy joined our server. His name was "TiddyBoi" and he absolutely decimated us. Literally nothing we did could stop this Ricochet killing machine. We typed Status into the console and found his Steam page. The man had played 2000+ hours of Ricochet. All he does is wait for people to come onto Ricochet, boot it up himself and decimate them.

Like a gatekeeper, an eternal guardian sworn to Ricochet, he waits, He waits for you to challenge him. Which is fucking awesome.
